Uses of Class
org.mixare.PaintableObject

Packages that use PaintableObject
org.mixare   
 

Uses of PaintableObject in org.mixare
 

Subclasses of PaintableObject in org.mixare
 class PaintableBox
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw an outlined box.
 class PaintableBoxedText
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw text with a box surrounding it.
 class PaintableCircle
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw a circle with a given radius.
 class PaintableGps
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw a circle with a given radius and a stroke width.
 class PaintableIcon
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw an icon.
 class PaintableLine
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw a line.
 class PaintablePoint
          This class extends PaintableObject and draws a small rectangle.
 class PaintablePosition
          This class extends PaintableObject and adds the ability to rotate and scale.
 class PaintableRadarPoints
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw all the Markers at their appropriate locations.
 class PaintableText
          This class extends PaintableObject to draw text.

          Paint generic object on the Canvas.
